dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5335 IH: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions reclassified to title 34, United States Code.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sensenbrenner (for himself, Mr. Goodlatte, and Mr. Nadler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions reclassified to title 34, United States Code.
